original_text: So, after the Lord Jesus had spoken to the disciples, God took him up into heaven. There he sat down at the right side of God.
korean_text: 주 예수께서 말씀을 마치신 후에 하늘로 올려지사 하나님 우편에 앉으시니라

sentences.original_text: So, after the Lord Jesus had spoken to the disciples
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 주 예수께서 제자들에게 말씀하신 후에

sentences.original_text: God took him up into heaven
at the right side of God
